org.readlogsfirst.api.logreader.logitemparser.tokenizers
Class RegExpTokenizer

java.lang.Object
  org.readlogsfirst.api.logreader.logitemparser.tokenizers.RegExpTokenizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
LineTokenizerStrategy
public class RegExpTokenizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements LineTokenizerStrategy

Tokenizer that splits the log line through a series of regular expressions. Regular expresisons are provided as a list of strings. They are eavluated one at a time.

Author:
fpacifici

Method Detail

tokenize

public java.util.List<?> tokenize(java.lang.String line)
                           throws LogItemParsingException
Gets a line from the splitter and tokenize it according to the policy provided by the implementation. Tokenizes the string according to the list of regular expressions given during initialization. each expression is searched for and the result is added to the output.

Specified by:
tokenize in interface LineTokenizerStrategy
Parameters:
line - is the input line
Returns:
the list of tokens.
Throws:
LogItemParsingException
